QuestData.Title: Hey There Dalliah
QuestData.Description: Two powerful agents of the Burning Legion, Wrath-Scryer Soccothrates and Dalliah the Doomsayer, have begun rallying the demons on board together into a small army.$B$BYou cannot let their forces grow any larger, or the Arcatraz may soon become yet another Legion stronghold.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We must do all we can to stop the Legion.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to kill Wrath-Scryer Soccothrates and Dalliah the Doomsayer in the Arcatraz of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: The Legion seeks only to consume. They hold no regard for the balance.
